1.title: Boomerang Banana Splits
1.plot: The Bumble Nums are making delicious Boomerang Banana Splits and need three boomeranging bananas. Can the Bumble Nums bag the three bananas they need in time for the Cooking Countdown?

2.title: Mouth-Watering Mac & Cheese
2.plot: Mmm. Today, the Bumble Nums are making Mouthwatering Mac and Cheese. They need to wrangle six speedy cheese wheels from the barn. Humble, Grumble, and Stumble must race the secret ingredient to the kitchen. Will they make it in time to make their mouthwatering meal?

3.title: Ballooning Blueberry Cobbler
3.plot: The Bumble Nums are making Ballooning Blueberry Cobbler. But first, they need to catch ten ballooning blueberries before they blow away. They do their best to nab the airborne blueberries, but can they get the fruit into their baskets before the Cooking Countdown?

4.title: Flying Dragon Fruit Cake
4.plot: Today, the ever-brave Bumble Nums go on an adventure back in time to make a Flying Dragon Fruit Cake. Lady Humble, Sir Grumble, and Sir Stumble's knightly skills are put to the test to try and bring the dragon fruit to the kitchen. Will they feast on Flying Dragon Fruit Cake...or will there be famine?

5.title: Bouncing Bean Burritos
5.plot: The Bumble Nums are setting out to gather bouncing beans for their Bouncing Bean Burritos, but where can they get them? But where can they get them? At the the tippy-top of a giant beanstalk. Humble, Grumble, and Stumble scramble up the tall plant and bounce around the puffy clouds, trying to catch the two boisterously bouncing beans. Can they bag the beans in time for the Cooking Countdown?

6.title: Spinning Pineapple Pizza
6.plot: The Bumble Nums are making Spinning Pineapple Pizza. But what's the secret ingredient? Seven spinning pineapples. Humble, Grumble, and Stumble find that patience is key to snagging the spinning pineapples. Will time run out before they can get to the kitchen?

7.title: Petrified Pumpkin Seed Snack
7.plot: It's Halloween and the Bumble Nums are making a spooktacular dish - Petrified Pumpkin Seed Snack Mix. With their trick-or-treat bucket in hand, they head to the petrified pumpkin patch to scare the spooky ingredient out of some pumpkins.

8.title: Out-Of-This-World Mooncake
8.plot: The Bumble Nums are making an Erupting Raspberry Lava Cake but the secret ingredient is at the top of Mount Fruity Volcano. Can Humble, Grumble, and Stumble climb the volcano and get what they need before it blows? And can they do it in time for the Cooking Countdown? Watch and see.

9.title: Honking Gooseberry Pie
9.plot: The Bumble Nums are making a delicious Honking Gooseberry Pie. But how can they get the secret ingredient when it's flying all over the place? Humble, Stumble, and Grumble wing it at first, then come up with a high-flying idea. Will it get them to the kitchen in time for the Cooking Countdown? Watch and see.

10.title: Erupting Raspberry Lava Cake
10.plot: The Bumble Nums are making an Erupting Raspberry Lava Cake but the secret ingredient is at the top of Mount Fruity Volcano. Can Humble, Grumble, and Stumble climb the volcano and get what they need before it blows? And can they do it in time for the Cooking Countdown? Watch and see.

11.title: Frozen Lychee Bubble Tea
11.plot: The Bumble Nums are making Frozen Lychee Bubble Tea in this super fun cartoon for kids. But they've been fishing for the secret ingredient, frozen lychees, all morning and haven't caught a thing. Their friend Yeti has a very fancy idea for getting what they need. Can he help them get the frozen lychees in time for the Cooking Countdown?

12.title: Groovy Movie Popcorn
12.plot: It's Movie Night. In this cartoon, The Bumble Nums are going to watch their favorite movie - and they need a warm, tasty snack to munch on. What's today's recipe? Groovy Movie Popcorn featuring the secret ingredient: four popcorn cobs. Can the Bumble Nums get the secret ingredient to the kitchen in time for Cooking Countdown, and give us a happy ending?

1.title: Purple Pear Pie
1.plot: The Bumble Nums work together to gather ingredients and prepare the most fantastic dishes from their Bumble Nums cookbook. Join Humble, Stumble, and Grumble as they team up to make Purple Pear Pie.

2.title: Underwater Watermelon Salad
2.plot: The Bumble Nums are going underwater for the secret ingredient for their next yum yum dish. Join them in this children's cartoon as they make a delicious Underwater Watermelon Salad.

3.title: Tunneling Turnip Turnover
3.plot: Here come The Bumble Nums in this installment of the original cartoon for children. Humble, Stumble, and Grumble are cooking Tunneling Turnip Turnover. Watch as they get spinning to catch the tunneling turnips.

4.title: Sparkling Strawberry Smoothies
4.plot: Join in the fun of the Bumble Num Kitchen as the Bumble Nums Make Stretchy Spaghetti Surprise.

5.title: Stretchy Spaghetti Surprise
5.plot: The Bumble Nums Make Stretchy Spaghetti Surprise.

6.title: Starlight Souffle
6.plot: When the sun goes down, it's time for Humble, Stumble, and Grumble to collect stars for their latest recipe - Startlight Souffle.

7.title: Steaming Stir Fry
7.plot: Yum yum. The Bumble Nums are making a yummy steaming stir fry with ringing bell peppers.

8.title: Swooping Spinach Pie
8.plot: It's swooping spinach season, and The Bumble Nums are preparing the most delicious Swooping Spinach Pie in town. Get ready to get swooped.

9.title: Boogie Down Baba Ganoush
9.plot: The Bumble Nums are making Boogie Down Baba Ganoush and need four boogying eggplants. How can they get the ingredient to the kitchen for the Cooking Countdown? Maybe a boogie down conga line will work?

10.title: Tricky Sticky Rice Dumplings
10.plot: The Bumble Nums are cooking something yummy again in this exciting cartoon for kids. Today they are making a delicious Tricky Sticky Rice Dumplings that will leave your mouth watering for days. Bon Appétit.

11.title: Chilly Cherry Cheesecake
11.plot: The Bumble Nums have come together again to gather the special ingredients for a delicious Chilly Cherry Cheesecake before the holiday season. Yum.

12.title: Crunchy Christmas Cookie
12.plot: It's Christmas Eve and the Bumble Nums are making Santa's favorite Christmas snack - a Crunchy Christmas Cookie. They need to gather the secret ingredient - seven crunchy chocolate chips - from the creepy, old Chocolate Chip Cave on top of Chocolate Chip Mountain.
